title: [FEATURE] Encode animated GIFs
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

I want to encode animated GIFs but SkiaSharp seems to be missing this feature.

### Describe the solution you would like

Given a series of 1-dimensional byte arrays of pixels in RGBA8888 (four bytes per pixel, one array per frame) a value for how long to delay on each frame and a width, encode an animated GIF.

### Describe alternatives you have considered

SixLabors.ImageSharp will do this and that's what I've been using so far but I'd like to switch to SkiaSharp because ImageSharp is my only dependency which isn't MIT-licensed. This is the only thing I'm using ImageSharp for which SkiaSharp (AFAIK) can't do.

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
